description.value: This code system defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate an organization affiliation role.

definition.value: Provider of services related to the promotion of mental health, resilience and wellbeing; the treatment of mental and substance use 9.disorders; and the support of those who experience and/or are in recovery from these conditions, along with their families and communities.
Has a relationship of participation with. This does NOT represent a member of an insurance plan, but other types of membership such as membership of a hospital in an HIE
Supplier of health care consumables or equipments supplied to patients.
A group of people, e.g. a group of Physicians, who render health care services.

Provider of health care services delivered to patients within their residence rather than a clinical setting; usually provided by nurses, home health aides, and other professionals on a regularly scheduled visit.
An inpatient facility, other than long-term care, providng patient treatment with specialzed medical and nursing staff and medical equipment.
Pathology and laboratory testing on clinical specimenst to obtain informaion about the health of a paeint to aid in diagnosis, treatment and prevention of disease.
An outpatient facility providing patient services, e.g. medical procedures, surgeries, etc.
An entity which provider services related to the storage, compounding, dispensing and sale of drugs.
A provider which transports patients to or from a medical facility, e.g., ambulance.
A center in which unscheduled health care services are provided for point-in-time evaluation or treatment of a non-life-threatening medical condition.
